rooms.desc: Providing complimentary breakfast buffets and coin-operated self-service laundry facilities, Yuhao Hotel (Hsinchu City Hotel No. 054) is placed just a 5-minute walk from Hsinchu Train Station.
Boasting 4 on-site restaurants and an indoor pool, Lakeshore Hotel Hsinchu is just a 5-minute walk from Chongcho lake. Free WiFi and free parking are available.
Darlon Hotel is located in Hsinchu City, 500 metres from Hsinchu Zoo and an 8-minute walk from Hsinchu City Glass Museum.
Offering a restaurant, Kindness Hotel-Hualien is located in Hualien. Free WiFi access is available throughout the property. Guests can enjoy free parking.
Set in the city centre of Hualien, HiYes Hotel 勤天商旅-花蓮館 is only a 7-minute walk from the Hualien Railway Station. Wi-Fi access is available for free throughout the building.

Classic City Resort offers comfortable accommodation just 5 to 7 minutes' walk from Hualien Railway Station and a 10-minute drive from the city centre. It provides an in-house restaurant, a business centre and a tour desk for guests’ convenience. WiFi is also free in all rooms.
A 15-minute walk to Kaohsiung City's Liuhe Night Market is Guide Hotel Kaohsiung Liuhe.
Hotel Sunshine is located in Kaohsiung’s Lingya District, a 15-minute metro ride from Kaohsiung Airport. Featuring oriental furnishings, the hotel offers a café and free WiFi in rooms.
Situated in Sanmin District, 2 minutes’ walk from MRT Houyi Station and 1 metro stop ride from Kaohsiung Railway Station, Hotel Midtown Richardson - Kaohsiung Bo'ai offers accommodation in Kaohsiung.
Offering modern guest rooms, 7 minutes walk from Taichung Railway Station, Golden Pacific Hotel is located in Taichung.
Designed with vintage and modern elements, BlueSky Hotel offers accommodation in downtown Taichung City. Free WiFi is available in all areas.
Featuring a shared lounge, Explore Hotel offers rooms in Xitun, 300 metres from Fengjia Night Market, 2.1 km from Taichung Football Field and 2.2 km from Shin Kong Mitsukoshi Taichung Zhonggang.

rooms.roomName: 路境行旅 台南西門館 Finders Hotel Tainan Ximen
rooms.desc: 路境行旅 台南西門館 Finders Hotel Tainan Ximen offers accommodation with free WiFi. Fee-based shuttle services are available.
Offering a restaurant, Hotel Cozzi Ximen Tainan is located in Tainan. Free WiFi access is available.

Situated in Tainan, 5.2 km from Chihkan Tower, XIUXI Anping Hotel features accommodation with a garden, free private parking, a shared lounge and a terrace. Among the facilities of this property are a restaurant, room service and a 24-hour front desk, along with free WiFi throughout the property. Guests can have a drink at the bar.

rooms.roomName: Episode Daan Taipei, JdV by Hyatt Hotel
rooms.desc: Conveniently located in the commercial district, the property is only a 3-minute walk from shopping area or Zhongxiao Fuxing MRT Station. Guests can enjoy the on-site restaurant. It offers a terrace and views of the city.

Ideally set in the Zhongzheng District district of Taipei, Meworld Hotel - Taipei Main Station is located 1 km from Presidential Office Building, less than 1 km from Taipei Zhongshan Hall and a 13-minute walk from MRT Ximen Station.

Ideally located in the centre of Taipei, set at Dunhua tree-lined boulevard. ILLUME TAlPEI is conveniently connected to the major transportation stations and landmarks in Taipei. MRT Nanjing Fuxing Station and Taipei Arena are both within a walking distance of the property.
